Build-Depends: cmake (>= 3.0), debhelper-compat (= 13), libdecor-0-dev [linux-any], libegl-dev, libgl-dev, libglx-dev, libgles-dev, libopengl-dev, libosmesa6-dev, libvulkan-dev [linux-any], libwayland-dev [linux-any], libx11-dev, libx11-xcb-dev, libxcursor-dev, libxi-dev, libxinerama-dev, libxkbcommon-dev, libxrandr-dev, pkgconf [linux-any]
